SELECT T1.POINT_WISHLIST_NO AS pointWishlistNo, T1.POINT_WISHLIST_MEMBER_ID AS pointWishlistMemberId, T1.POINT_WISHLIST_ITEM_NO AS pointWishlistItemNo, T1.POINT_WISHLIST_TIME AS pointWishlistTime,
T2.POINT_ITEM_NAME AS pointItemName, T2.POINT_ITEM_SRC AS pointItemSrc, T2.POINT_ITEM_PRICE AS pointItemPrice FROM POINT_WISHLIST T1 INNER JOIN POINT_ITEM_STORE T2 -- ★ 여기를 POINT_ITEM_STORE 로 수정해야 합니다! ON T1.POINT_WISHLIST_ITEM_NO = T2.POINT_ITEM_NO WHERE T1.POINT_WISHLIST_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY T1.POINT_WISHLIST_TIME DESC
